page.title: 09AMENITIES IN COLD ASHTON.
page.content: There is no doctor's surgery in this area, but residents are well served by a group practice of 4 {doctors}with surgeries at Wick, Marshfield,Pucklechurch and Colerne. One doctor is always on call. There is a baby{clinic}in Marshfield and hospitals at Bath and Bristol. A{mobile library}serves the area fortnightly stopping at Tog Hill Farm, Cold Ashton Manor, Pennsylvania and other outlying places. This is accompanied by a mobile{information {van}funded by Avon Community Council and Manpower Services.Information includes leaflets on employment, social security benefits, leisure activities, trading standards, health education and many others. In certain areas a{mobile shop}and a fishmonger call weekly. A Marshfield newsagent delivers papers and bread.
